name: Messenger Contact List
summary: Learn about .CTT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Contacts saved in a CTT file can be imported into Messenger by selecting Fileâ†’Import Contacts from a Saved File.
NOTE: Windows Live Messenger was discontinued in 2013 and has moved to Skype.

description: Stores a list of contacts and groups used by the MSN/Live Messenger instant messaging program; saved as a text file and formatted in XML; can be exported from MSN Messenger and imported by another user.
